snippet.title: Mega Man Y+1: Operation X.M.A.S. arrives December 8th!
snippet.description:
08/12/2023: The game is out! Download it here: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/mega-man-y-1-operation-x-m-a-s.1959/

Surprise! Mega Man Y+1: Operation X.M.A.S., a sidegame to the upcoming Mega Man Y+1, will be releasing tomorrow! We've been very busy with Y+1 over the past few years, but that's a lot of work without any play, so we whipped up a special game for you all to enjoy at this year's Christmas SAGE event!

Tackle 9 holiday-themed levels each filled with both familiar Y+1 foes and brand new faces! You'll be travelling from from gingerbread castles to bustling electronic stores to... the beach? Don't expect things to be easy - with 6 brand new weapons at your side, you'll have to choose carefully about which 2 to take into each stage. Can you complete the Xtreme Mega Action Series?

To those eager for the latest Y+1 news, make no mistake: plenty is on the way, and maybe Operation X.M.A.S. includes a few little secrets of its own...

An accessibility overview for Mega Man Y+1: Operation X.M.A.S. can be found here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ga5qtMep4cDhXy2rh3lDuqr2wNA1GudS/view?usp=sharing

Discord: https://discord.gg/VdX3ATp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lmteam_
